DOC.detailed_description: The single patient treatment instruction use intend single patient advance soft tissue sarcoma . The patient treat YONDELIS® ( trabectedin ) i.v . formulation dose 1.5 mg/m2 i.v . 24 hour Day 1 every 21 day , provide he/she fulfills eligibility criterion . The patient may continue receive therapy evidence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Safety evaluate serious adverse event report . Disease assessments occur accord institutional practice .
